resp = client.render_search_template(
    source="{ \"query\": { \"bool\": { \"filter\": [ { \"range\": { \"@timestamp\": { \"gte\": {{#year_scope}} \"now-1y/d\" {{/year_scope}} {{^year_scope}} \"now-1d/d\" {{/year_scope}} , \"lt\": \"now/d\" }}}, { \"term\": { \"user.id\": \"{{user_id}}\" }}]}}}",
    params={
        "year_scope": True,
        "user_id": "kimchy"
    },
)
